description: Wolves: 'A transitional season which could easily go wrong'
title: Wolves: 'A transitional season which could easily go wrong'
title_page: Wolves: 'A transitional season which could easily go wrong' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Former Chelsea and Scotland winger Pat Nevin has been speaking to BBC Sport to look ahead to the new season: "Right now I am more worried about Wolves than any of the other established Premier League teams, with the possible exception of Everton.
"This is a transitional season that could easily go wrong. How well money is spent during the transfer window will decide their fate."
